title: totalvi
description: Performs TotalVI integration of CITE-seq and scRNA-seq data.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

input.description: Input h5mu file to be integrated.

prot_modality.description: Name of the modality in the input (query) h5mu file containing protein data

input_layer_rna.description: Input layer to use from the rna modality for gene counts

input_layer_protein.description: Input layer to use from the protein modality for protein counts

obs_batch.description: Column name discriminating between your batches.

obs_size_factor.description: Key in adata.obs for size factor information

obs_categorical_covariate.description: Keys in adata.obs that correspond to categorical data

obs_continuous_covariate.description: Keys in adata.obs that correspond to continuous data

var_gene_names.description: .var column in the rna modality containing gene names

var_protein_names.description: .var column in the protein modality containing protein names

obsm_output.description: In which .obsm slot to store the resulting integrated embedding.

obsm_normalized_rna_output.description: In which .obsm slot to store the normalized RNA data from TOTALVI.

obsm_normalized_protein_output.description: In which .obsm slot to store the normalized protein data from TOTALVI.

output_compression.description:
Compression format to use for the output AnnData and/or Mudata objects.
By default no compression is applied.

n_obs_min_count.description: Minimum number of cells threshold ensuring that every obs_batch category has sufficient observations (cells) for model training.

n_var_gene_min_count.description: Minimum number of genes threshold ensuring that sufficient observations (genes) are present for model training.

n_var_protein_min_count.description: Minimum number of proteins threshold ensuring that sufficient observations (genes) are present for model training.

gene_dispersion.description:
Set the behavior for the dispersion for negative binomial distributions:
  - gene: dispersion parameter of negative binomial is constant per gene across cells
  - gene-batch: dispersion can differ between different batches
  - gene-label: dispersion can differ between different labels
  - gene-cell:  dispersion can differ for every gene in every cell

protein_dispersion.description:
Set the behavior for the dispersion for negative binomial distributions:
  - protein: dispersion parameter of negative binomial is constant per protein across cells
  - protein-batch: dispersion can differ between different batches
  - protein-label: dispersion can differ between different labels
  - protein-cell:  dispersion can differ for every protein in every cell

gene_likelihood.description:
Model used to generate the expression data from a count-based likelihood distribution.
- nb: Negative binomial distribution
- zinb: Zero-inflated negative binomial distribution

latent_distribution.description:
Set the latent distribution to use:
  - normal: Normal distribution
  - ln: Log-normal distribution (Normal( 0, 1) transformed by softmax)

empirical_protein_background_prior.description:
Set the initialization of protein background prior empirically.
This option fits a GMM for each of 100 cells per batch and averages the distributions.
Note that even with this option set to True, this only initializes a parameter that is learned during inference.
If False, randomly initializes.
By default, sets this to True if greater than 10 proteins are used.

override_missing_proteins.description: If True, will not treat proteins with all 0 expression in a particular batch as missing.

max_epochs.description: Number of passes through the dataset, defaults to (20000 / number of cells) * 400 or 400; whichever is smallest.

early_stopping.description: Whether to perform early stopping with respect to the validation set.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
